Class GameBoardGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • GameBoardGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class GameBoardGUI
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    This Class is used to create, load and display the actual game board GUI part of the game .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • loadGameBoardGUI

        public void loadGameBoardGUI(GameDifficulty aLevel)
        Loads the game board GUI with all the features of the difficulty level specified.
        Parameters:
        aLevel - GameDifficulty, The enumerated difficulty level of the game.

      • launchGameBoardGUI

        public void launchGameBoardGUI()
        Used to launch (or display) the actual gameboard GUI after it has been set up using the gameboard load function.

      • setSolidGridCellValue

        public void setSolidGridCellValue(int aX,
                         int aY,
                         int aValue)
        Used to set a Sudoku grid box to a correct value that cannot be changed by the user. Used after the gameboard load function to set the starting values of the board.
        Parameters:
        aX - Integer, The X postion.
        aY - Integer, The Y postion.
        aValue - Integer, The value to be put in the grid box/cell.

      • setGridCellValue

        public void setGridCellValue(int aX,
                    int aY,
                    int aValue)
        Used to set a Sudoku grid box to a correct value (this value can be changed by the user. Used after the gameboard load and launch functions usually by the users entering in values with the keyboard.
        Parameters:
        aX - Integer, The X position.
        aY - Integer, The Y position.
        aValue - Integer, The value to be put in the grid box/cell

      • getGridCellValue

        public int getGridCellValue(int aX,
                   int aY)
        Used to get a Sudoku grid box value. Used after the gameboard load function.
        Parameters:
        aX - Integer, The X position.
        aY - Integer, The Y position.
        Returns:
        Integer, The value of the Sudoku box/cell.

      • setRemainingAssists

        public void setRemainingAssists(int aAssistsRemaining)
        Sets the amount of remaining user assists to display in the assist box on the gameboard from the back end. Called after the gameboard load function.
        Parameters:
        aAssistsRemaining - Integer, The number of assists remaining to set in the assist box.

      • getRemainingAssists

        public int getRemainingAssists()
        Gets the amount of remaining user assists that is displayed in the assist box on the gameboard. Called after the gameboard load function.
        Returns:
        Integer, The number of assists remaining.

      • setTimer

        public void setTimer(java.lang.String aTimerValue)
        Sets the remaining time left to be displayed in the time box on the gameboard.
        Parameters:
        aTimerValue - String, The time remaining in the format of mm:ss.

      • stopTimer

        public void stopTimer()
        Stops the existing countdown timer.
